GameObject
Class KillSet

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.KillSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class KillSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class used as a container to store the data needed to calculate the score obtained from a bomb blast. We keep track of the location of the bomb that killed the passed enemy, as well as the location of the death. With this information We can calculate the distance between the bomb blast and the enemy, which we use to determine which enemies died first from a bomb blast.

See Also:
